title: In Cannabis, You Have To Be Comfortable Being Uncomfortable
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: We are on the cusp of another burst of M&A in the cannabis industry, but one grounded more in fiscal responsibilities. Scott Hammon, partner and leader of the cannabis practice at MGO, joins Rena Sherbill to discuss this trend amidst the rapidly maturing cannabis industry. We also cover why companies are putting a stronger emphasis on regional footprints over a national one; good operators will be able to take advantage of this market no matter size or business model. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
